modName: Clothing Tempering Patch for Loot and Degradation
summary: Creates tempering recipes for _all_ of your clothing items
descriptionHtml:
xEdit script which generates tempering recipes for [i]all[/i] clothing items you have in your load order - including clothing mods, cloaks, basically everything that's marked as clothing. Feel free to edit the script to suit your needs.

Based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68898/?]merrymac's Temper Clothing[/url], made possible by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68617/?]mator's MXPF[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49373/?]Automation Tools[/url].

Made for use with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55677/?]Loot and Degradation by isoku[/url], since [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68898/?]merrymac's Temper Clothing[/url] only covered vanilla assets.

Required libraries included - drop into "TES5Edit/Edit Scripts" - overwrite if needed, fire up TES5Edit, apply script "MXPF Clothing Tempering"
author: kamikatze13
